tiles.title: Total Population Count
tiles.query:
//LAD/WAD Installed or Enabled Count
union cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    WADDailySnapshot, cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').
    LADDailySnapshot
| summarize Population = dcount(ResourceId)

tiles.title: Agent Version Windows Population
Top Windows OS Populations
tiles.query:
//Current Windows pop by OS version
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WADDailySnapshot
| summarize
    OSResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId) by OSVersion
| where OSResourceCount > 0
| sort by OSResourceCount
| take 20

tiles.title: Top Region Windows Populations
tiles.query:
//Current Windows pop by Region
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WADDailySnapshot
| project
    Region,
    ResourceId
| summarize
    OSResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId)
    by Region
| where OSResourceCount > 0
| sort by OSResourceCount
| take 20

tiles.title: Agent Version Windows Population
tiles.query:
//Windows AMA Version breakdown
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WinAMADailySnapshot
| summarize WinAgentCount = dcount(ResourceId) by Version
| where WinAgentCount > 0
| sort by WinAgentCount

tiles.title: Grouped Region Windows Populations
Region Group Windows Populations
Arc/Non-Arc Windows Population
tiles.query:
//Windows Pop by Arc type
HealthSummaryDaily
| where StartTime > ago(90d)
| where OSVer has "windows"
| project ResourceId
| extend Arc = iif(ResourceId has "/microsoft.HybridCompute/", "ARC", "NON-ARC")
| summarize totalResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId) by Arc
| where totalResourceCount > 0
| sort by totalResourceCount

tiles.title: Top Grouped Windows OS Populations
tiles.query:
//Current windows os population grouped
cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WinAMADailySnapshot
| extend OS_gen = replace_string(OSVersion, 'Windows:', '')
| extend OS_gen = replace_string(OS_gen, 'Linux:', '')
| extend OS_gen = replace_string(OS_gen, 'DataCenter', 'Datacenter')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(\D.*)(\d+)\.(\d+)\..*', @'\1\2.\3')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(\d\d\d\d.*?)[-].*', @'\1')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(Standard).*', @'\1')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(Datacenter).*', @'\1')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(Windows \d+ \D+?)[ -].*', @'\1')
| extend OS_gen = replace_regex(OS_gen, @'(\D+.\d+\.\d+).*', @'\1')
| summarize
    OSResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId)
    by OS_gen
| where OSResourceCount > 0
| sort by OSResourceCount
| take 20

tiles.title: Linux Arc  vs Non_Arc Resource Pop
Solutions Pop by Linux Agent Count
Windows Agent Population by OS Version
tiles.query:
// Windows Agent Population by OS Version

let WorkspaceOS = union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| summarize HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0, HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0 by WorkspaceId;
union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| where not(HasWindows) or not(HasLinux) // use this filter to eliminate 'heterogeneous' workspaces
| extend WindowsOSVersion = strcat("Windows ",OSVersion)
| summarize WinAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Windows"), WinResourceCount = dcountif(ResourceId, OSType == "Windows"),  WinWorkspaceCount = dcountif(WorkspaceId, OSType == "Windows") by WindowsOSVersion
| where WinAgentCount > 0
| sort by WinAgentCount desc

tiles.title: Windows Agent Version Population
Linux Agent Version Population
Linux Agent Population by OS Version
tiles.query:
// Linux Agent Population by OS Version

let WorkspaceOS = union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| summarize HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0, HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0 by WorkspaceId;
union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| where not(HasWindows) or not(HasLinux) // use this filter to eliminate 'heterogeneous' workspaces
| extend linuxOSVersion = strcat(OSDistro," ",OSVersion)
| summarize LnxAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Linux"), LnxResourceCount = dcountif(ResourceId, OSType == "Linux"), LnxWorkspaceCount = dcountif(WorkspaceId, OSType == "Linux") by linuxOSVersion
| where LnxAgentCount > 0
| sort by LnxAgentCount desc

tiles.title: Windows Agent Count by Region
tiles.query:
// Windows Populations by Region

let WorkspaceOS = union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| summarize HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0, HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0 by WorkspaceId;
union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| where not(HasWindows) or not(HasLinux) // use this filter to eliminate 'heterogeneous' workspaces
| where Region != "onpremise"
| summarize WinAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Windows") by Region
| sort by WinAgentCount desc
| take 12

tiles.title: Linux Agent Count by Region
tiles.query:
// Linux Populations by Region

let WorkspaceOS = union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows")
| summarize HasWindows = countif(OSType == "Windows") > 0, HasLinux = countif(OSType == "Linux") > 0 by WorkspaceId;
union Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot), Latest(cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot)
| extend OSType = iff(isnotempty(OSDistro), "Linux", "Windows"), Solution = Solutions
| join kind = leftouter WorkspaceOS on WorkspaceId
| where not(HasWindows) or not(HasLinux) // use this filter to eliminate 'heterogeneous' workspaces
| summarize LnxAgentCount = dcountif(AgentId, OSType == "Linux") by Region
| sort by LnxAgentCount desc
| take 12

tiles.title: Region Group Linux Populations
Solution/Extension Windows Population - 30d
tiles.query:
//Windows Pop by solution/extension
HealthReport
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-30d) .. now())
| where OSVer has "windows"
| where _Ext has "true"
| project _Ext, ResourceId
| mv-expand _Ext to typeof(string)
| where _Ext has "true"
//| extend _Ext = replace_regex(_Ext, @'{"(.*?)".*', @'\1')
| summarize ResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId) by _Ext
| sort by ResourceCount desc

tiles.title: Solution/Extension Linux Population - 30d
tiles.query:
//Linux Pop by solution/extension
HealthReport
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-30d) .. now())
| where OSVer !has "windows"
| where _Ext has "true"
| project _Ext, ResourceId
| mv-expand _Ext to typeof(string)
| where _Ext has "true"
//| extend _Ext = replace_regex(_Ext, @'{"(.*?)".*', @'\1')
| summarize ResourceCount = dcount(ResourceId) by _Ext
| sort by ResourceCount desc

tiles.title: Azure vs On-prem vs. Arc
Linux Population Trend
tiles.query:
//OMS Linux Population Trend

union (cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshotOld | where Date < datetime(2020-06-28)), cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').LinuxDailySnapshot
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyMax = max(DailyCount) by startofmonth(Date)
| render timechart

tiles.title: Windows Population Trend

cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize MonthlyMax = max(DailyCount) by startofmonth(Date)

tiles.title: Weekly Windows Pop Trend for agent versions older than 10_20_18053 with 22s excluded
Monthly Windows Pop Trend for agent versions older than 10_20_18053 with 22s excluded
tiles.query:
//Weekly Windows Pop Trend for agent versions older than 10_20_18053

cluster('genevaagent.kusto.windows.net').database('Telemetry').WindowsDailySnapshot
| where Date between (now(-92d) .. now())
| where AgentVersion !in~ ("10.20.18067.0",	"1.0.18067.0", "10.20.18064.0", "1.0.18064.0", "10.20.18062.0", "1.0.18062.0", "10.20.18053.0", "1.0.18053.0","10.20.18057.0","10.22.10056.0","10.22.10058.0","10.22.10061.0","10.22.10070.0")
| summarize DailyCount = count() by Date
| summarize Montly_Max_Older_Than_10_20_18053 = max(DailyCount) by startofmonth(Date)
